net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dndb_getAttackModiferBonusForSpell
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Given a toon, spell, and modifiers, determine the bonus attack modifier for a spell (does not include the base value of ability + proficiency; Only the bonus)
arg (0) = Toon arg (1) = ToonSpell arg (2) = modifiers of subType = spell-attacks
